Question
========

We assume that the events of the birth of a girl or a boy are independent of each other. If one family has 5 children, what is the probability that all the children are of the same sex?

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2
* 1/5
* 1/16
* 1/24

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/2: Incorrect
* 1/5: Incorrect
* 1/16: Correct
* 1/24: Incorrect
